entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
